title: Photos: Sonam Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor And The Rest Of The Kapoor Clan At A Family Wedding In Abu Dhabi

Ph otos: Sonam Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor And The Rest Of The Kapoor Clan At A Family Wedding In Abu Dhabi Divya Rao Feb . 27 . 2017 
So, there‚Äôs yet another big, fat Bollywood wedding happening and this time, it‚Äôs Sonam Kapoor and Arjun Kapoor ‚Äòs cousin Akshay Marwah . He‚Äôs having a lavish wedding at the Emirates Palace in Abu Dhabi and this whole family is there to celebrate his special day with him. Here are some photos of the Kapoor family at his mehendi.
